availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Louisa, Kentucky hotel keeper. Virginia native. Married Christina Regania Miller Bussey in 1838. Father of Fremont Randall Bussey. Louisa postmaster from 1849 to 1853.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lawrence County, p. 76. Virginia Marriages, 1740-1850, Ancestry, Cabell County, 1838. Appointment of Postmasters, 1832-1971, vol. 14, Lawrence County, p. 650. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lawrence County, Louisa, p. 183. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lawrence County, Louisa, p. 8. Kentucky Vital Statistics Original Death Certificates (1911-1955), Ancestry, 1940, Lawrence County, file no. 2023. “H. S. Bussey,” Find A Grave, July 1, 2014, Memorial no. 132147801.
